name: Louis AIELLO, Appellant, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY
name_abbreviation: Aiello v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Louis AIELLO, Appellant, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Tina Marcy Weber, for Louis Aiello.
G. Roger Bowers, Philadelphia, Joan A. Zubras, Alfred W. Putnam, Jr., Philadelphia, for S.E.P.T.A.

Louis AIELLO, Appellant, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY.

Decided Dec. 14, 1998.
Tina Marcy Weber, for Louis Aiello.
